name: Pimsleur
0:
”Alexa open pimsleur”
”Alexa play pimsleur”
”Alexa launch pimsleur”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pimsleur
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now master any language you want faster, easier and more confidently than ever before with the new Pimsleur Language Programs skill for Alexa.
 
For more than 50 years, Pimsleur has helped millions of people speak their choice of over 50 foreign languages like a native. Our scientifically proven method enables you to speak and understand a new language in as little as 30 minutes a day — simply, reliably and with a near-native accent.
 
Pimsleur courses are available for 50 languages including Spanish, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Chinese (Mandarin & Cantonese), Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, and many more!

With Pimsleur, your lessons are completely hands-free. You can learn anytime, anywhere. Using your Alexa-enabled device Just say, “Alexa, open Pimsleur,” and begin streaming audio lessons to turn your downtime into a powerful new skill. 

Switch to the Pimsleur app on your phone for streaming, or download lessons for offline use. For a true untethered experience, use the hands-free driving (or running, hiking, coffee-drinking) mode. Whether you’re online, offline, on your way to work, or out for a stroll, Pimsleur follows you wherever you go – and picks up exactly where you left off.

Pimsleur 30-minute audio lessons put you on an easy track to master any of 50 most-popular languages. Whether you’re traveling, studying, or adding a brilliant new skill to your list of accomplishments, Pimsleur gets you to near fluency faster and easier than any other method. Try a free lesson and see just how easy it is to get started. Just listen and repeat.

*Not all features are available for all languages. For more information or a complete list of languages, please visit us at Pimsleur.com.
